title: How to Create a Beast Boy Costume

steps.title: Purchase a black unitard.
steps.content: Purchase a black unitard. Use purple fabric paint to draw and color in the purple square on his chest. You may want to consider using Lycra fabric for a more authentic look. Lycra provides a four-way stretch, ensuring the suit fits snugly to your body.

steps.title: Buy a utility belt, or make one using this DIY method.
steps.content: Buy a utility belt, or make one using this DIY method. Purchase grey and black craft foam and a silver material. Cut out and hot glue together little squares out to the craft foam, and attach the material on top. Make a grey circle and a smaller black one; glue the smaller one on top for a 3D effect. Attach these onto a grey belt.

steps.title: Get grey gloves and using fabric paint or black craft foam, attach a stripe going horizontal on the glove.
steps.content: Get grey gloves and using fabric paint or black craft foam, attach a stripe going horizontal on the glove. Get a pair of black combat boots and paint them purple, and add black stripes on the front and grey around the edge.

steps.title: Gather your supplies.
steps.content: Gather your supplies. For the makeup, you will need: Green face paint (water-based is recommended) Translucent setting powder Elf ears A set of Vampire teeth

steps.title: Attach on the elf ears, and paint your face, ears, and neck green.
steps.content: Attach on the elf ears, and paint your face, ears, and neck green. It helps if someone helps you do it.

steps.title: Set your face paint with the translucent powder.
steps.content: Set your face paint with the translucent powder.

steps.title: Take the of the vampire teeth, and using a dental adhesive, attach it onto your bottom incisors.
steps.content: Take the of the vampire teeth, and using a dental adhesive, attach it onto your bottom incisors.

steps.title: Spray your hair green with temporary spray, or purchase a green wig online.
steps.content: Spray your hair green with temporary spray, or purchase a green wig online.
